StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [DeleteIRTStop]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@stopId UNIQUEIDENTIFIER AS BEGIN
DECLARE @stopNumber int DECLARE @cardId uniqueidentifier SELECT @stopNumber = StopNumber, @cardId = IRTCardID FROM RSSOSS.USMC.IRTStops WHERE StopID = @stopId
-- STEP 1: Start the transac.on BEGIN TRANSACTION
DELETE FROM USMC.IRTStops WHERE StopID = @stopId
UPDATE USMC.IRTStops SET StopNumber = StopNumber - 1 WHERE StopNumber > @stopNumber AND IRTCardID = @cardId
-- STEP 4: If we reach this point, the commands completed successfully -- Commit the transac.on.... COMMIT TRANSACTION
END
